quote: Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don't have the strength.
Life is trying things to see if they work.
Do you have the patience to wait until your mud settles and the water is clear?
Wherever there is danger, there lurks opportunity; wherever there is opportunity, there lurks danger. The two are inseparable.
Forget safety. Live where you fear to live.
If you don't have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
No idea, no matter how good, will work if it doesn't get used.
